sfw.name: fashion editorial
sfw.description: High-end magazine-style fashion image with strong styling, deliberate pose, and art-directed lighting and composition. Think bold wardrobe, curated set design, and a cohesive visual story.

sfw.name: beauty close-up
sfw.description: Tight portrait focused on face and makeup details (skin texture, eyes, lips), usually with clean backgrounds and controlled light. Emphasize cosmetics, hairline detail, and flattering angles.

sfw.name: studio lookbook
sfw.description: Catalog-like studio series showcasing outfits clearly. Clean studio backdrop, even lighting, and readable full/three-quarter body framing so clothing is easy to see.

sfw.name: catalog photo
sfw.description: Product-forward fashion photo where the outfit is the hero. Simple background, neutral pose, sharp focus, minimal storytelling; optimize clarity and garment readability.

sfw.name: runway fashion
sfw.description: Catwalk presentation with confident stride and stage lighting. Emphasize runway environment, audience blur, dramatic spotlights, and couture garment movement.

sfw.name: street fashion
sfw.description: Candid-yet-styled fashion in real urban locations. Natural light, city textures, lifestyle energy, and outfit as part of the environment.

sfw.name: cinematic still
sfw.description: A single film-frame moment with narrative tension. Use cinematic lighting, depth, camera framing, and a clear story beat; avoid looking like a posed studio shot.

sfw.name: golden hour portrait
sfw.description: Warm, low-angle sunset light with soft flare and gentle contrast. Emphasize glowing rim light, long shadows, and a natural outdoor feel.

sfw.name: low key portrait
sfw.description: Moody portrait with deep shadows and controlled highlights. Use dramatic contrast, selective illumination, and a darker background for intensity.

sfw.name: concept art
sfw.description: Design-focused illustration that communicates a character idea clearly. Use readable silhouettes, material callouts, and worldbuilding hints; can be painterly or sketchy but must feel designed.

sfw.name: fantasy illustration
sfw.description: Illustrated fantasy scene/character with magical elements, ornate materials, and mythic atmosphere. Use stylized lighting and storybook or epic fantasy cues.

sfw.name: sci-fi illustration
sfw.description: Illustrated futuristic aesthetic: advanced materials, tech details, neon or industrial lighting, and sci-fi props/architecture. Prioritize believable tech design language.

sfw.name: digital painting
sfw.description: Painterly artwork with visible brushwork/painted rendering rather than photographic realism. Emphasize stylization, color harmony, and artistic texture.

sfw.name: anime style
sfw.description: Stylized 2D anime illustration: simplified facial features, clean linework, flat-to-cel shading, and expressive eyes. Avoid describing camera gear or photographic realism.

sfw.name: semi-real anime
sfw.description: Anime-inspired character with more realistic proportions and rendering. Softer shading, more detailed materials, but still clearly illustrated (not a photo).

sfw.name: vtuber model
sfw.description: A stylized streamer-avatar character design (often anime-inspired) with polished, clean rendering. Emphasize character readability, signature outfit, and a modern online persona vibe.

sfw.name: 3D character render
sfw.description: A CGI/3D-rendered character with physically plausible materials, studio or scene lighting, and a rendered look. Mention subsurface scattering, glossy fabric, or game/film-quality rendering cues.

sfw.name: game character art
sfw.description: Character key art suitable for a game: dynamic pose, clear silhouette, gear details, and thematic world cues. Often high-contrast, dramatic lighting, and action-ready styling.

sfw.name: oil painting portrait
sfw.description: Traditional oil portrait look with layered paint texture, rich pigments, and classical lighting. Mention canvas texture, brushwork, and painterly edges.

sfw.name: watercolor portrait
sfw.description: Watercolor illustration with soft blooms, transparent washes, and paper grain. Use gentle edges, light color layering, and a delicate handmade feel.

sfw.name: art nouveau poster
sfw.description: Decorative poster style with flowing organic lines, ornate borders, and elegant typography-like framing (but do not include actual text). Emphasize floral motifs and flat-yet-detailed color blocks.

sfw.name: pop art style
sfw.description: Bold graphic look with high-contrast colors, halftone dots, thick outlines, and comic-inspired shapes. Emphasize punchy palettes and poster-like simplicity.

sfw.name: cyberpunk artwork
sfw.description: Neon-drenched futuristic urban vibe with high contrast, rain reflections, holograms, and dense signage-like ambience (without real brand text). Emphasize techwear, chrome, and moody atmosphere.

sfw.name: glamour photo
sfw.description: Stylized beauty/fashion portrait emphasizing elegance, polish, and flattering lighting. Think magazine glamour: smooth light, confident pose, refined styling, and a luxurious vibe (SFW).

sfw.name: high fashion editorial
sfw.description: Avant-garde fashion imagery with daring styling, striking poses, and art-directed composition. Emphasize couture details, dramatic lighting, and an intentional, editorial mood.

sfw.name: waifu
sfw.description: Anime-style character art designed to be charming and appealing in a cute/romantic way. Emphasize expressive eyes, clean linework, and wholesome, SFW character design.

sfw.name: kemonomimi
sfw.description: Anime-style character with animal ears (e.g., cat/fox/bunny) as a design element. Emphasize cute stylization, ear/ tail details if present, and a cohesive fantasy-anime aesthetic.

sfw.name: ai influencer
sfw.description: Photoreal or stylized social-media persona image with polished styling and contemporary trends. Emphasize modern makeup, trendy outfit, and a confident “online creator” vibe.

sfw.name: instagram aesthetic
sfw.description: Highly curated lifestyle/fashion image with cohesive color grading and composition. Emphasize clean backgrounds, pleasing symmetry, and trendy styling.

sfw.name: tiktok content
sfw.description: Modern short-form creator vibe: energetic pose, casual setup, bold styling, and attention-grabbing framing. Emphasize contemporary youth culture styling while keeping it adult and SFW.

sfw.name: pinterest mood board
sfw.description: A cohesive, curated aesthetic collage feel translated into one image. Emphasize color palette harmony, styling cues, and a “trend board” vibe.

sfw.name: film photography aesthetic
sfw.description: Analog film look: natural grain, softer contrast, subtle color shifts, and slight imperfections. Emphasize 35mm feel, gentle highlights, and nostalgic tone.

sfw.name: polaroid snapshot
sfw.description: Instant-camera vibe: soft focus, slight overexposure, warm tint, and a casual candid composition. Emphasize the instant-photo feel and simple framing.

sfw.name: disposable camera aesthetic
sfw.description: Flash-forward, candid look with harsh on-camera flash, grain, and casual framing. Emphasize candid realism and imperfect exposure.

sfw.name: 90s magazine scan
sfw.description: Retro print look with slight halftone, paper texture, and scanned artifacts. Emphasize 1990s editorial vibes and subtle print imperfections.

sfw.name: y2k digital aesthetic
sfw.description: Early-2000s pop-digital vibe: glossy highlights, playful accessories, vibrant colors, and nostalgic tech-era styling. Emphasize shiny textures and Y2K fashion cues.

sfw.name: vaporwave art
sfw.description: Retro-futuristic neon palette with 80s/90s nostalgia, gradients, and surreal digital motifs. Emphasize pink/teal tones, grid sunsets, and dreamy synth vibes.

sfw.name: lofi aesthetic
sfw.description: Soft, cozy, low-contrast vibe with muted colors and calm mood. Emphasize warm interiors, gentle lighting, and relaxed composition.

sfw.name: dark academia portrait
sfw.description: Moody scholarly aesthetic: vintage clothing, libraries, candles, and warm low light. Emphasize old books, tweed/linen textures, and a contemplative atmosphere.

sfw.name: cottagecore scene
sfw.description: Pastoral, handmade, nature-forward vibe: soft light, flowers, linen fabrics, and rustic interiors. Emphasize warmth, simplicity, and natural textures.

sfw.name: ethereal fantasy
sfw.description: Dreamy, otherworldly vibe with soft glow, mist, delicate textures, and magical atmosphere. Emphasize light bloom, airy fabrics, and gentle color palettes.

sfw.name: renaissance painting
sfw.description: Classical fine-art look with balanced composition, soft chiaroscuro, and period clothing cues. Emphasize painted texture, muted pigments, and museum-quality framing.

sfw.name: baroque portrait
sfw.description: Dramatic classical painting style with deep shadows, rich fabrics, ornate details, and strong directional light. Emphasize theatrical mood and luxurious textures.

sfw.name: ukiyo-e style
sfw.description: Traditional Japanese woodblock-print aesthetic: flat color areas, stylized linework, patterned fabrics, and decorative composition. Emphasize print texture and classic motifs.

sfw.name: art deco illustration
sfw.description: Geometric, elegant poster style with sharp shapes, metallic accents, and symmetrical composition. Emphasize sleek luxury and 1920s–1930s design cues.

sfw.name: soviet poster art
sfw.description: Bold propaganda-poster visual language: limited palette, strong shapes, dynamic angles, and heroic composition (without real slogans). Emphasize graphic design and dramatic perspective.

sfw.name: pulp fiction cover
sfw.description: Retro paperback cover illustration with exaggerated drama, bold title-space framing (but do not include actual text), and high-contrast lighting. Emphasize noir/pulp mood and dynamic staging.

sfw.name: noir detective scene
sfw.description: Classic film-noir mood: high-contrast shadows, smoke/fog, dramatic backlight, and tense storytelling. Emphasize trench coats, street lamps, and moody urban settings.

sfw.name: retro sci-fi illustration
sfw.description: Vintage sci-fi cover art vibe with optimistic futurism, bold shapes, and mid-century design language. Emphasize retro tech, rayguns/space motifs, and stylized colors.

nsfw.name: erotic art piece
nsfw.description: Adult-themed artwork with sensual mood. Keep it non-graphic and tasteful; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: fine art nude photography
nsfw.description: Adult-only fine art nude photography. Keep it non-graphic and tasteful; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts or pornographic framing.

nsfw.name: hentai
nsfw.description: Adult-only anime-style erotic artwork. Keep language non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: ecchi
nsfw.description: Adult-only suggestive anime-style artwork with playful eroticism. Keep language non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: adult vtuber model
nsfw.description: Adult-only stylized streamer-avatar character design (often anime-inspired) with polished, clean rendering. Emphasize character readability, signature outfit, and a modern online persona vibe. Keep it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: nsfw 3D character render
nsfw.description: Adult-only CGI/3D-rendered character with physically plausible materials, studio or scene lighting, and a rendered look. Mention subsurface scattering, glossy fabric, or game/film-quality rendering cues. Keep it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid  explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: adult game character art
nsfw.description: Adult-only character key art suitable for a game: dynamic pose, clear silhouette, gear details, and thematic world cues. Often high-contrast, dramatic lighting, and action-ready styling. Keep it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: pin-up art
nsfw.description: Retro-inspired illustration or poster-style character art with vintage glamour and playful pose. Keep it tasteful and non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: dark feminine glamour
nsfw.description: Stylized beauty/fashion portrait emphasizing elegance, polish, and flattering lighting with a mysterious, edgy vibe. Think magazine glamour: smooth light, confident pose, refined styling, and a luxurious vibe. Keep it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: boudoir glamour
nsfw.description: Stylized intimate portrait emphasizing mood, lighting, and tasteful sensual styling. Think magazine glamour: smooth light, confident pose, refined styling, and a luxurious vibe. Keep it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: fetish fashion
nsfw.description: Edgy fashion imagery with fetish-inspired styling (e.g., latex, leather, corsets) presented in a tasteful, art-directed manner. Emphasize confident poses, dramatic lighting, and high-fashion vibes while keeping it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: erotic fantasy illustration
nsfw.description: Illustrated fantasy scene/character with magical and sensual elements, ornate materials, and mythic atmosphere. Use stylized lighting and storybook or epic fantasy cues while keeping it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: sci-fi pin-up art
nsfw.description: Futuristic retro-inspired illustration or poster-style character art with sci-fi elements and playful pose. Keep it tasteful and non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: adult comic book art
nsfw.description: Graphic novel-style illustration with mature themes presented in a non-graphic manner. Emphasize dynamic poses, bold linework, and storytelling while avoiding explicit sex acts and never depicting minors.

nsfw.name: erotic surrealism
nsfw.description: Surrealist artwork with sensual themes presented in an abstract, non-literal manner. Emphasize dreamlike imagery, symbolic elements, and artistic expression while keeping it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: nsfw digital painting
nsfw.description: Adult-only painterly artwork with visible brushwork/painted rendering rather than photographic realism. Emphasize stylization, color harmony, and artistic texture while keeping it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: nsfw anime style
nsfw.description: Adult-only stylized 2D anime illustration: simplified facial features, clean linework, flat-to-cel shading, and expressive eyes. Avoid describing camera gear or photographic realism. Keep language non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts .

nsfw.name: nsfw semi-real anime
nsfw.description: Adult-only anime-inspired character with more realistic proportions and rendering. Softer shading, more detailed materials, but still clearly illustrated (not a photo). Keep language non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: nsfw instagram aesthetic
nsfw.description: Adult-only highly curated lifestyle/fashion image with cohesive color grading and composition. Emphasize clean backgrounds, pleasing symmetry, and trendy styling while keeping it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: nsfw tiktok content
nsfw.description: Adult-only modern short-form creator vibe: energetic pose, casual setup, bold styling, and attention-grabbing framing. Emphasize contemporary youth culture styling while keeping it adult and non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

nsfw.name: nsfw film photography aesthetic
nsfw.description: Adult-only analog film look: natural grain, softer contrast, subtle color shifts, and slight imperfections. Emphasize 35mm feel, gentle highlights, and nostalgic tone while keeping it non-graphic; never depict minors; avoid explicit sex acts.

makeup_style.name: no makeup natural
makeup_style.description: Barely-there makeup: natural skin texture, minimal product, subtle grooming, understated finish.

makeup_style.name: bare minimum tinted moisturizer
makeup_style.description: Very light base with sheer coverage; natural brows and lashes; fresh, simple look.

makeup_style.name: clean girl effortless
makeup_style.description: Minimal, polished makeup: groomed brows, subtle blush, glossy lips, dewy skin.

makeup_style.name: soft glam everyday
makeup_style.description: Wearable glam: soft eyeshadow, defined lashes, gentle contour, flattering natural tones.

makeup_style.name: natural beauty enhanced
makeup_style.description: Enhancement-focused: even complexion, subtle highlight, light definition without dramatic colors.

makeup_style.name: fresh faced dewy
makeup_style.description: Hydrated glow: luminous skin, minimal powder, soft blush, glossy lip, light eye definition.

makeup_style.name: sun-kissed healthy glow
makeup_style.description: Bronzed warmth: soft bronzer, warm blush, subtle shimmer highlight, natural glossy lips.

makeup_style.name: glass skin luminous
makeup_style.description: Ultra-luminous, smooth skin look: bright highlight, dewy finish, minimal texture emphasis.

makeup_style.name: matte flawless finish
makeup_style.description: Full-coverage matte base, smooth finish, crisp definition, minimal shine, polished look.

makeup_style.name: romantic soft pink
makeup_style.description: Pink-forward palette: rosy blush, soft pink lids, gentle lip tint, delicate romantic vibe.

makeup_style.name: warm bronzed goddess
makeup_style.description: Warm glam: bronze eyeshadow, golden highlight, strong bronzer, sunlit glow.

makeup_style.name: cool toned sculpted
makeup_style.description: Cool contouring: taupe/gray-brown shadows, sculpted cheeks, crisp highlight, refined finish.

makeup_style.name: old hollywood glamour
makeup_style.description: Classic vintage glam: red lipstick, defined liner, softly contoured cheeks, elegant polish.

makeup_style.name: 90s supermodel matte
makeup_style.description: 90s runway vibe: matte base, brown liner, neutral lips, subtle smoky eye, strong cheekbones.

makeup_style.name: 90s brown tones
makeup_style.description: Brown lip liner + neutral brown shadows, warm contour, understated 90s aesthetic.

makeup_style.name: 80s bold colorful
makeup_style.description: Bold 80s colors: bright eyeshadow, strong blush, vivid lips, high-contrast playful glam.

makeup_style.name: 70s disco shimmer
makeup_style.description: Shimmery lids, glossy highlight, warm tones, dramatic lashes; retro disco sparkle.

makeup_style.name: 60s mod dramatic
makeup_style.description: Mod makeup: graphic liner, bold lashes, pale lip, clean shapes, high-contrast eyes.

makeup_style.name: 50s pinup classic
makeup_style.description: Pinup: winged eyeliner, red or rosy lips, smooth base, classic feminine polish.

makeup_style.name: korean soft gradient
makeup_style.description: K-beauty gradient lips, soft blush, straight brows, subtle shimmer, youthful gentle look.

makeup_style.name: japanese natural flush
makeup_style.description: Soft, natural blush and subtle eye makeup; fresh understated J-beauty style.

makeup_style.name: chinese douyin glam
makeup_style.description: Douyin-inspired: bright under-eye highlight, glossy lips, sparkly eyes, cute high-impact glam.

makeup_style.name: latte warm neutral
makeup_style.description: Warm neutral browns: creamy beige-brown palette, soft contour, glossy neutral lips.

makeup_style.name: strawberry pink fresh
makeup_style.description: Fresh pink blush and lips with dewy skin; cute rosy look.

makeup_style.name: peach coral sunny
makeup_style.description: Peach/coral tones on cheeks and lips; warm, sunny, lively makeup.

makeup_style.name: berry rich deep
makeup_style.description: Berry lip tones with complementary blush; richer saturated palette.

makeup_style.name: plum sultry dark
makeup_style.description: Plum/burgundy tones, deeper eyeshadow, sultry dramatic mood.

makeup_style.name: nude understated
makeup_style.description: Neutral nude lips and soft definition; minimal color, clean and understated.

makeup_style.name: mob wife dramatic glam
makeup_style.description: High-glam statement: sharp liner, heavy lashes, bold lip, intense contour and highlight.

makeup_style.name: coquette soft feminine
makeup_style.description: Soft blush, delicate liner, glossy lips, sweet romantic details.

makeup_style.name: dark feminine mysterious
makeup_style.description: Smokier eyes, deeper lip tones, sharp definition; confident and mysterious vibe.

makeup_style.name: gothic pale dramatic
makeup_style.description: Pale base, dark lipstick, heavy liner, high contrast; gothic drama.

makeup_style.name: grunge smudged undone
makeup_style.description: Smudged eyeliner, messy shadow, muted lips; intentionally imperfect grunge look.

makeup_style.name: punk bold graphic
makeup_style.description: Graphic eyeliner, bold shapes/colors, high contrast; edgy punk aesthetic.

makeup_style.name: ethereal fairy light
makeup_style.description: Soft shimmer highlight, pastel tones, delicate sparkle; airy magical glow.

makeup_style.name: editorial avant-garde
makeup_style.description: High-fashion experimental makeup: unusual shapes/colors, bold styling, runway/editorial vibe.

makeup_style.name: euphoria artistic

makeup_style.name: festival glitter bold
makeup_style.description: Bright colors, glitter, face gems; energetic festival-ready styling.

fashion_outfit.name: lingerie set
fashion_outfit.description: Adult-only intimate outfit; keep framing tasteful and non-graphic if used.

fashion_outfit.name: silk pajama set
fashion_outfit.description: Silky pajama two-piece; luxurious loungewear vibe.

fashion_outfit.name: saree traditional
fashion_outfit.description: Traditional saree drape; elegant cultural garment with rich fabric and pleats.

fashion_outfit.name: lehenga bridal
fashion_outfit.description: Lehenga-style formal outfit; ornate embroidery and ceremonial styling.

fashion_outfit.name: salwar kameez
fashion_outfit.description: Traditional tunic + pants set; graceful comfortable cultural attire.

fashion_outfit.name: cheongsam qipao
fashion_outfit.description: Fitted traditional dress with high collar and elegant tailoring.

fashion_outfit.name: hanfu traditional
fashion_outfit.description: Flowing Hanfu robes; layered traditional silhouettes and elegant fabric movement.

fashion_outfit.name: kimono formal
fashion_outfit.description: Formal kimono styling; structured layers, obi belt, refined traditional look.

fashion_outfit.name: yukata casual
fashion_outfit.description: Casual summer kimono; lighter fabric and relaxed festival vibe.

fashion_outfit.name: hanbok korean
fashion_outfit.description: Traditional Hanbok silhouette; high-waist skirt and colorful layered garments.

fashion_outfit.name: modern abaya
fashion_outfit.description: Modern abaya with contemporary tailoring; modest flowing outer garment.

fashion_outfit.name: kaftan flowing
fashion_outfit.description: Loose flowing kaftan; relaxed airy silhouette and drapey fabric.

fashion_outfit.name: dashiki colorful
fashion_outfit.description: Colorful patterned dashiki-inspired garment; bold textiles and cultural styling.

fashion_outfit.name: dirndl bavarian
fashion_outfit.description: Traditional Bavarian dirndl; bodice + skirt + apron styling.

fashion_outfit.name: flamenco dress
fashion_outfit.description: Flamenco-inspired dress with ruffles; dramatic movement and bold Spanish flair.

fashion_outfit.name: nurse uniform
fashion_outfit.description: Uniform-inspired outfit; keep non-fetish, SFW context.

fashion_outfit.name: flight attendant uniform
fashion_outfit.description: Professional uniform styling; tailored, neat, airline-inspired look.

fashion_outfit.name: maid uniform
fashion_outfit.description: Costume/uniform styling; keep SFW and non-fetish framing.

fashion_outfit.name: schoolgirl uniform
fashion_outfit.description: Uniform styling; ensure adult-coded character (young adult) and SFW framing.

fashion_outfit.name: cheerleader uniform
fashion_outfit.description: Sport uniform with pleated skirt and team vibe; SFW framing.

fashion_outfit.name: military dress uniform
fashion_outfit.description: Formal military-style dress uniform; structured, decorated, ceremonial look.

fashion_outfit.name: astronaut suit
fashion_outfit.description: Space suit with helmet/gear; sci-fi technical outfit silhouette.

fashion_outfit.name: racing suit
fashion_outfit.description: Motorsport racing suit; fitted utility suit with sporty detailing.

fashion_style.name: high fashion editorial
fashion_style.description: Avant-garde, magazine/editorial styling with bold silhouettes, dramatic posing, and art-directed composition.

fashion_style.name: couture runway
fashion_style.description: Runway/catwalk couture: statement garments, luxurious fabrics, and show lighting; outfit is the centerpiece.

fashion_style.name: minimalist clean
fashion_style.description: Simple, refined wardrobe with clean lines, neutral palette, minimal accessories, and uncluttered styling.

fashion_style.name: maximalist bold
fashion_style.description: Loud, layered, pattern-mixed styling with strong color, statement accessories, and high visual density.

fashion_style.name: boho free spirit
fashion_style.description: Relaxed bohemian styling: flowing fabrics, earthy tones, fringes, embroidery, and eclectic accessories.

fashion_style.name: romantic feminine
fashion_style.description: Soft, elegant styling with delicate fabrics, lace/satin cues, flattering silhouettes, and gentle color palettes.

fashion_style.name: cottagecore pastoral
fashion_style.description: Pastoral, handmade vibe: linen/cotton, floral prints, pinafore dresses, and soft natural textures.

fashion_style.name: dark academia scholarly
fashion_style.description: Vintage scholarly look: tweed, turtlenecks, wool coats, muted tones, and library-ready refinement.

fashion_style.name: light academia soft
fashion_style.description: Warm, airy academia: creams/beiges, cardigans, pleats, soft tailoring, and optimistic vintage cues.

fashion_style.name: preppy classic
fashion_style.description: Clean, collegiate styling: polos, blazers, pleats, loafers, and crisp well-groomed silhouettes.

fashion_style.name: old money understated
fashion_style.description: Heritage luxury without logos: tailored basics, cashmere/wool, muted palette, and impeccable fit.

fashion_style.name: quiet luxury
fashion_style.description: Premium minimalism: subtle high-quality materials, restrained accessories, and elegant simplicity.

fashion_style.name: mob wife glamour
fashion_style.description: Opulent, bold glam: faux fur/leather, gold jewelry, dramatic makeup, and high-status attitude.

fashion_style.name: clean girl aesthetic
fashion_style.description: Fresh, minimal styling: neutral basics, sleek hair, dewy makeup, and effortless polished simplicity.

fashion_style.name: coquette feminine
fashion_style.description: Sweet, flirty feminine styling: bows, ribbons, soft pinks, delicate details, and playful romance.

fashion_style.name: balletcore graceful
fashion_style.description: Ballet-inspired fashion: wrap tops, tights, soft knits, delicate shoes, and poised elegant lines.

fashion_style.name: tenniscore sporty
fashion_style.description: Tennis/prep athletic styling: pleated skirts, polos, clean whites, and sporty refined accessories.

fashion_style.name: coastal grandmother
fashion_style.description: Relaxed seaside elegance: linen sets, cardigans, neutrals, straw accessories, and calm upscale comfort.

fashion_style.name: tomato girl mediterranean
fashion_style.description: Sunny Mediterranean summer styling: breezy dresses, red accents, baskets, and coastal market energy.

fashion_style.name: streetwear urban
fashion_style.description: Modern streetwear: hoodies, sneakers, graphic layers, oversized fits, and city-casual attitude.

fashion_style.name: gorpcore outdoor
fashion_style.description: Technical outdoor fashion: hiking shells, utility pockets, trail shoes, and practical performance layering.

fashion_style.name: techwear functional
fashion_style.description: Futuristic utility styling: black/gray palette, straps, modular pockets, sleek performance fabrics.

fashion_style.name: normcore basic
fashion_style.description: Intentionally plain everyday basics: simple tees, jeans, neutral layers, and low-key accessories.

fashion_style.name: blokecore casual
fashion_style.description: Football/sports-casual vibe: jerseys, track jackets, relaxed denim, and pub-ready street casual.

fashion_style.name: skater punk
fashion_style.description: Skate culture styling: baggy tees, hoodies, loose pants, sneakers, and gritty youthful edge.

fashion_style.name: grunge layered
fashion_style.description: 90s grunge layering: flannel, distressed denim, band-tee vibe, muted tones, and messy texture.

fashion_style.name: gothic romantic
fashion_style.description: Dark, elegant gothic styling: lace/velvet, dramatic silhouettes, ornate details, and moody refinement.

fashion_style.name: cyber goth
fashion_style.description: Industrial cyber-goth: black base with neon accents, straps, platform boots, and club-tech attitude.

fashion_style.name: e-girl aesthetic
fashion_style.description: Internet alt styling: contrast colors, playful accessories, layered tops, and trendy edgy makeup cues.

fashion_style.name: soft girl pastel
fashion_style.description: Cute pastel styling: soft colors, cozy knits, gentle silhouettes, and sweet youthful accessories.

fashion_style.name: dark feminine
fashion_style.description: Confident, moody elegance: black-forward palette, sharp silhouettes, and a powerful feminine vibe.

fashion_style.name: kawaii cute
fashion_style.description: Japanese cute styling: bright accents, adorable motifs, playful accessories, and cheerful proportions.

fashion_style.name: gyaru japanese
fashion_style.description: Bold Japanese gyaru fashion: glam makeup, flashy outfits, tan/gloss cues, and confident party vibe.

fashion_style.name: lolita victorian
fashion_style.description: Lolita-inspired Victorian doll fashion: frills, lace, petticoats, and ornate modest silhouettes.

fashion_style.name: y2k nostalgic
fashion_style.description: Early-2000s vibe: low-rise silhouettes, glossy materials, baby tees, and playful pop accessories.

fashion_style.name: mcbling sparkly
fashion_style.description: 2000s bling-glam: rhinestones, metallics, velour, flashy jewelry, and high-shine styling.

fashion_style.name: indie sleaze
fashion_style.description: Messy-cool party fashion: leather jackets, smudged makeup, flash-photo vibe, and 2000s club edge.

fashion_style.name: 90s supermodel
fashion_style.description: 90s model-off-duty and runway glamour: sleek silhouettes, minimal makeup, and confident chic.

fashion_style.name: 80s power dressing
fashion_style.description: Strong 80s tailoring: shoulder pads, bold colors, statement belts, and executive confidence.

fashion_style.name: 70s bohemian
fashion_style.description: 70s boho: wide-leg pants, earthy prints, suede/fringe cues, and warm retro palettes.

fashion_style.name: 60s mod
fashion_style.description: 60s mod styling: geometric shapes, mini dresses, bold color blocks, and clean graphic lines.

fashion_style.name: 50s rockabilly
fashion_style.description: 50s rockabilly/pinup fashion: polka dots, high-waist silhouettes, bandanas, and retro charm.

fashion_style.name: 40s wartime elegance
fashion_style.description: 1940s tailored practicality: structured dresses/suits, modest lines, and classic period details.

fashion_style.name: roaring 20s flapper
fashion_style.description: 1920s flapper glamour: fringe, beading, art deco cues, feather accessories, and party elegance.

fashion_style.name: victorian gothic
fashion_style.description: Victorian-inspired dark couture: corsetry cues, high collars, lace, and dramatic antique silhouettes.

fashion_style.name: regencycore bridgerton
fashion_style.description: Regency-era romantic fashion: empire waists, gloves, soft pastels, and period elegance.

fashion_style.name: cyberpunk neon
fashion_style.description: Neon cyberpunk street style: techwear, chrome accents, bold lighting, and futuristic urban edge.

fashion_style.name: solarpunk eco
fashion_style.description: Optimistic eco-future styling: light fabrics, natural colors, plant motifs, and sustainable tech cues.

fashion_style.name: steampunk industrial
fashion_style.description: Steampunk fashion: leather, brass, goggles, corsetry/tailcoats, and Victorian-meets-machinery details.

fashion_style.name: retro futurism
fashion_style.description: Mid-century retro-future: clean shapes, optimistic sci-fi cues, glossy plastics, and space-age styling.

fashion_style.name: vaporwave aesthetic
fashion_style.description: Vaporwave fashion vibe: neon/pastel gradients, 80s/90s nostalgia, and playful surreal pop styling.

fashion_style.name: festival bohemian
fashion_style.description: Festival-ready boho: layered jewelry, crochet/fringe, bold patterns, and carefree outdoor styling.

fashion_style.name: athleisure sporty
fashion_style.description: Sport-meets-street: leggings, performance sets, sneakers, and functional comfortable silhouettes.

fashion_style.name: resort vacation
fashion_style.description: Resort wear: breezy fabrics, sunglasses, swim coverups, and relaxed luxury holiday styling.

fashion_style.name: après ski
fashion_style.description: After-ski luxury: puffer jackets, knit layers, fur-trim cues, snow boots, and cozy alpine glam.

fashion_style.name: western cowgirl
fashion_style.description: Western/cowgirl fashion: denim, boots, belts, fringe, hats, and rustic Americana attitude.

fashion_style.name: biker rebel
fashion_style.description: Biker style: leather jacket, boots, dark palette, metal hardware, and tough rebellious edge.

lighting_style.name: soft daylight
lighting_style.description: Even, flattering daylight with soft shadows and natural color; gentle, realistic illumination.

lighting_style.name: window light
lighting_style.description: Directional soft light from a window; natural falloff, gentle highlights, cozy interior feel.

lighting_style.name: golden hour
lighting_style.description: Warm low-angle sunlight near sunset; soft glow, rim light, long shadows.

lighting_style.name: blue hour
lighting_style.description: Cool twilight ambience; blue tones, soft contrast, calm evening mood.

lighting_style.name: low key spotlight
lighting_style.description: Dark scene with focused key light; strong contrast, deep shadows, dramatic mood.

lighting_style.name: high key studio
lighting_style.description: Bright, evenly lit studio look; minimal shadows, clean crisp exposure.

lighting_style.name: gelled studio light
lighting_style.description: Studio lights with colored gels; stylized color casts and controlled highlights.

lighting_style.name: rim lighting
lighting_style.description: Back/edge light outlining the subject; strong silhouette separation from background.

lighting_style.name: neon lighting
lighting_style.description: Neon sources with vibrant colored light; strong color contrast and nightlife vibe.

lighting_style.name: cinematic practical lights
lighting_style.description: Visible light sources in-scene (lamps, signs); cinematic mood with motivated lighting.

lighting_style.name: mixed color temperature
lighting_style.description: Warm and cool lights together; contrasting tones (e.g., tungsten + daylight) for depth.

lighting_style.name: hard sunlight
lighting_style.description: Direct harsh sun; sharp shadows, high contrast, strong highlights.

lighting_style.name: volumetric lighting
lighting_style.description: Light beams visible through haze/fog/dust; atmospheric shafts and depth.

lighting_style.name: rembrandt lighting
lighting_style.description: Classic portrait lighting with a triangular cheek highlight; painterly, sculpted face.

lighting_style.name: split lighting
lighting_style.description: Face split half-lit, half-shadow; strong drama and definition.

lighting_style.name: butterfly lighting
lighting_style.description: Key light above camera creating a small shadow under nose; flattering beauty portrait look.

lighting_style.name: god rays
lighting_style.description: Strong radiant beams of light through clouds/trees/windows; ethereal dramatic effect.

lighting_style.name: chiaroscuro
lighting_style.description: Extreme light/dark contrast; painterly dramatic shadows and highlights.

lighting_style.name: bioluminescent glow
lighting_style.description: Self-illuminated glow from flora/fauna/objects; surreal luminous highlights in darkness.

camera_lens.name: macro close-up
camera_lens.description: Extreme close focus for fine details; shallow depth of field and intimate framing.

camera_lens.name: headshot
camera_lens.description: Tight framing on head and face; portrait emphasis with minimal body.

camera_lens.name: shoulder-up portrait
camera_lens.description: Portrait framing from shoulders upward; classic portrait composition.

camera_lens.name: waist-up shot
camera_lens.description: Medium portrait showing torso to waist; balance of face and outfit.

camera_lens.name: three-quarter body
camera_lens.description: Framing shows subject from head to knees; good for outfit readability.

camera_lens.name: full body
camera_lens.description: Full figure in frame from head to toe; emphasizes pose and outfit silhouette.

camera_lens.name: environmental long shot
camera_lens.description: Wider composition showing subject within environment; strong sense of place.

camera_lens.name: low angle
camera_lens.description: Camera below subject looking up; makes subject feel powerful/tall.

camera_lens.name: high angle
camera_lens.description: Camera above subject looking down; can feel vulnerable, cute, or observational.

camera_lens.name: top-down
camera_lens.description: Overhead view straight down; graphic composition and flattening perspective.

camera_lens.name: wide angle
camera_lens.description: Wide field of view; more environment, potential perspective distortion near edges.

camera_lens.name: telephoto
camera_lens.description: Long lens compression; flattering portrait background blur and reduced distortion.

camera_lens.name: fish-eye
camera_lens.description: Ultra-wide fisheye distortion; curved lines and playful exaggerated perspective.

camera_lens.name: dutch tilt
camera_lens.description: Tilted horizon; dynamic, uneasy, or edgy cinematic composition.

camera_lens.name: over-the-shoulder
camera_lens.description: Shot from behind one shoulder; implies viewpoint and story context.

camera_lens.name: anamorphic
camera_lens.description: Cinematic widescreen look with oval bokeh and horizontal flares; filmic vibe.

camera_lens.name: tilt-shift
camera_lens.description: Selective focus plane; miniature effect or controlled focus; stylized perspective.

camera_lens.name: 35mm film
camera_lens.description: 35mm film aesthetic: natural grain, gentle contrast, classic documentary feel.

camera_lens.name: 85mm portrait
camera_lens.description: Classic portrait focal length; flattering compression and creamy background blur.

camera_lens.name: 50mm prime
camera_lens.description: Natural perspective prime lens; versatile portrait with balanced field of view.

color_palette.name: black and white classic
color_palette.description: Monochrome palette; strong contrast and timeless photographic look.

color_palette.name: sepia vintage
color_palette.description: Warm brown sepia tones; antique nostalgic feel.

color_palette.name: warm neutrals beige
color_palette.description: Warm beige/cream neutrals; soft cozy minimal palette.

color_palette.name: cool neutrals gray
color_palette.description: Cool grays and muted tones; modern, calm, subdued palette.

color_palette.name: soft pastels
color_palette.description: Light pastel colors with low contrast; airy gentle mood.

color_palette.name: dusty rose pink
color_palette.description: Muted rosy pinks; romantic, soft and modern.

color_palette.name: sage green natural
color_palette.description: Muted sage greens; organic, calm, natural palette.

color_palette.name: butter yellow warm
color_palette.description: Warm pale yellow accents; cheerful soft sunlight vibe.

color_palette.name: lavender dreamy
color_palette.description: Lavender/purple haze; dreamy, delicate, ethereal palette.

color_palette.name: earth tones natural
color_palette.description: Browns, olives, clay, sand; grounded outdoorsy palette.

color_palette.name: terracotta warm
color_palette.description: Terracotta and warm clay tones; Mediterranean warmth.

color_palette.name: jewel tones rich
color_palette.description: Saturated emerald/ruby/sapphire tones; luxurious rich color.

color_palette.name: teal and orange cinematic
color_palette.description: Cinematic complementary grade: teal shadows + warm orange highlights.

color_palette.name: pink and blue vaporwave
color_palette.description: Neon pinks and blues; retro synth/vaporwave vibe.

color_palette.name: red and black dramatic
color_palette.description: High-contrast red/black palette; bold graphic drama.

color_palette.name: all white clean
color_palette.description: Predominantly white palette; bright minimal clean aesthetic.

color_palette.name: all black moody
color_palette.description: Black-dominant palette; dark, sleek, moody styling.

color_palette.name: golden hour warm
color_palette.description: Warm sunlit grading; amber highlights and soft warmth.

color_palette.name: blue hour cool
color_palette.description: Cool blue grading; twilight ambience and calm mood.

color_palette.name: sunset gradient
color_palette.description: Gradient from warm to cool like a sunset sky; colorful atmospheric blend.

color_palette.name: neon cyberpunk
color_palette.description: Neon magenta/cyan/green highlights with dark shadows; futuristic nightlife palette.

color_palette.name: chrome futuristic
color_palette.description: Cool metallics and silvers; reflective sci-fi palette.

color_palette.name: 90s kodak film
color_palette.description: 90s film color response: gentle grain, warm skin tones, slightly muted saturation.

color_palette.name: 80s miami vice
color_palette.description: 80s neon pastel vibe: hot pinks, cyan, purple; flashy retro palette.

color_palette.name: 70s burnt orange
color_palette.description: 70s earthy warm palette with burnt orange and browns; nostalgic warmth.

color_palette.name: 60s pop art bold
color_palette.description: Bold primary colors and high contrast; graphic pop-art energy.

color_palette.name: noir high contrast
color_palette.description: Deep blacks and bright highlights; stark dramatic contrast.

color_palette.name: faded film vintage
color_palette.description: Faded, low-saturation film look; nostalgic washed tones.

color_palette.name: cross processed
color_palette.description: Cross-processed film look: shifted hues, punchy contrast, stylized color casts.

color_palette.name: technicolor saturated
color_palette.description: Highly saturated classic cinema colors; vibrant bold multi-color palette.
